shrimp.name: Printf
shrimp.author: rconstruct

input.name: var
input.type: color normal vector point matrix string float

output.name: val
output.type: color normal vector point matrix string float

shrimp.usage: Similar to the C printf, prints the contents of the specified variables into stdout. The formatting for the string uses %f, %c, %p, %m and %s, for variables of type float, color, normal/vector/point, matrix, and string. The string has the variable type and a newline concatenated. See block code for details.
